snippet: Leicester City, the surprise winner of the Premier League, received a grueling education on how the European tournament operates months before its start....

headline.main: From Mowing to Mascots: Playing by the Champions League’s Rules
headline.print_headline: Welcome to the Party. Now Do Your Homework.

abstract: Leicester City has spent time since its unexpected Premier League title preparing its stadium and players for club's entry into UEFA Champions League; UEFA has very strict requirements for teams that make league, something Leicester City has very little experience with.
lead_paragraph: Leicester City, the surprise winner of the Premier League, received a grueling education on how the European tournament operates months before its start.

snippet: Away goals weigh heavily on every Champions League matchup, and Barcelona’s advantage may seem out of reach for a team that has failed to score against weak competition....

headline.main: Against Barcelona, Arsenal Gives Up 2 Goals and Possibly All Hope
headline.print_headline: Arsenal Gives Up 2 Goals, and Possibly All Hope

abstract: Sam Borden On Soccer column discusses implications of Barcelona's 2-0 road win over Arsenal in Champions League match, given European soccer's controversial 'away-goal' method of breaking ties.
lead_paragraph: Away goals weigh heavily on every Champions League matchup, and Barcelona’s advantage may seem out of reach for a team that has failed to score against weak competition.

snippet: Paris St.-Germain was pleased to gain a slight advantage in the first leg of its Champions League matchup with Chelsea, but it was also frustrated the margin was not wider....

headline.main: Paris St.-Germain Wins but Rues What Might Have Been
headline.print_headline: Paris St.-Germain Wins but Rues What Might Have Been

abstract: Paris St-Germain beats Chelsea, 2-1, in Champions League round of 16.
lead_paragraph: Paris St.-Germain was pleased to gain a slight advantage in the first leg of its Champions League matchup with Chelsea, but it was also frustrated the margin was not wider.
